mapper.select: SELECT s.site FROM site_ticket_strategy_info s WHERE s.ticket_id = #{ticketId}

SELECT s.id, s.strategy_name AS strategyName, s.sub_stadium_id AS subStadiumId, s.site, s.date_type AS dateType, s.week_details AS weekDetails, s.specific_date AS specificDate, s.time_code AS timeCode, s.time_interval_id AS timeIntervalId, s.sell_price AS sellPrice, s.cost_price as costPrice, s.store_price AS storePrice FROM site_ticket_strategy_info s WHERE s.ticket_id = #{ticketId} ORDER BY date_type

SELECT s.field_id AS fieldId, s.order_date AS orderDate, s.time_interval_id AS timeIntervalId, s.status FROM site_time_interval_status s
date_format(s.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{searchTime}
